mapper.select: create table if not exists Community ( uuid integer primary key autoincrement, id, district_id, city_id, unit_price, count, name, district_name, city_name, longitude, latitude );
mapper.insert:
insert or replace into Community( id,district_id, city_id, unit_price, count,name, district_name, longitude, latitude,city_name) values
(#{item.id},#{item.district_id},#{item.city_id},#{item.unit_price} ,#{item.count},#{item.name},#{item.district_name},#{item.longitude},#{item.latitude},#{item.city_name})
